item.title: WGA’s Contract Priorities Begin to Take Shape as 2026 Negotiations Loom
item.description: It took nearly a decade for the number of working writers in Hollywood to climb from just over 5,000 to nearly 7,000 at the peak of Peak TV in 2022. It has taken just two years to collapse. Only 5,228
